spdfcore

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • spdfcore.Id
      • spdfcore.Actor

  • public class Actor
extends Id
    Models an instance of an actor (a 'filter') - a node of SPDF graph. An actor has a name, a function (i.e. type) and the list of links to the channels. Some actors are purely analytical (flag auto) It inherits the name, the "function" and an assignment to a graph from Id.
    Author:
    Petro Poplavko

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      If an actor is dataflow actor or inserted communication actor.
